effect.sun_moon: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.
